description: Officially not given a name, Noro was a cat Daikaku found in the crawlspace of the estate. They became very close to one another very fast. Daikaku said, upon being asked by Shino how he would call the cat over without a name, that he didn`t have to, it was always right by his side. Noro was the only animal that ever approached Daikaku.
name: Noro
